articles.title: S&P 500 Gains and Losses Today: Tech Stocks Fall to Finish Holiday Week - Investopedia
articles.description: The S&P 500 fell 1.1% on Friday, Dec. 27, 2024, as tech stocks lost ground heading into the final weekend of the year.
articles.content:
